attributes.long-description:
Learn real fishing tips!
It's the most realistic fishing game ever! Sit back, tie on a lure, and cast a line across the tranquil lakes and the tumbling streams surrounding the placid Aqua Lodge. You might learn a trick or two from the master!

Catch the action beneath the surface!
Even when the fish are biting, they won't be fooled by beginner's luck. Match thin leaders with the right lures--then let the fish run before they snap your line!

Explore stunning wilderness locations!
As you catch fish with your array of lures, flies, and bait, you'll be introduced to new remote locations with tricky holding areas and crafty lunkers!

attributes.name: Reel Fishing®: The Great Outdoors
